mapper.select: SELECT rnum, market_no, market_title, market_writer, market_category , market_regist_date, market_modify_date, market_use_yn, market_hit_count, market_price, market_like_count, user_nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, market_no, market_title, market_writer, market_category , market_regist_date, market_modify_date, market_use_yn, market_hit_count, market_price, market_like_count, user_nickname FROM ( SELECT m.market_no ,m.market_title ,m.market_writer ,m.market_category ,m.market_regist_date ,m.market_modify_date ,m.market_use_yn ,m.market_hit_count ,m.market_price ,m.market_like_count ,u.user_nickname FROM marketboards m, users u where m.market_writer = u.user_id ORDER BY market_no DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}

SELECT m.market_no ,m.market_title ,m.market_writer ,m.market_content ,m.market_category ,m.market_regist_date ,m.market_modify_date ,m.market_use_yn ,m.market_hit_count ,m.market_price ,m.market_like_count ,u.user_nickname FROM marketboards m, users u where m.market_writer = u.user_id and market_no =#{marketNo} and market_use_yn = 1
mapper.insert:
select MARKETBOARDS_SEQ.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO marketboards (market_no, market_title, market_content, market_writer, market_category, market_regist_date, market_modify_date, market_use_yn, market_hit_count, market_price, market_like_count) VALUES(#{marketNo}, #{marketTitle}, #{marketContent}, #{marketWriter}, #{marketCategory}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 1, 0, #{marketPrice}, 0)

select MARKETBOARDS_SEQ.currval from dual
INSERT INTO MARKETFILES (ATTACH_ORIGINAL_NAME, ATTACH_SAVE_NAME, ATTACH_TYPE, MARKET_NO, MARKET_FILE_NO, MARKET_IMAGE_FILE_DATA) VALUES(#{attachOriginalName}, #{attachSaveName}, #{attachType}, #{marketNo}, MARKETFILES_SEQ.nextval, #{imageFileData})
